Hi,

why you are using junit if your intention is
not to write unit tests?
=

Overall it sounds to be more a pure programming
issue than a task of unit =
testing by itself.
Maybe it's better to ask how to call your api
and how to=
 test it in general.

So don't missunderstand the purpose of junit and
unit=
 testing at all.
